short_summary: Cleaning and building maintenance services for military facilities in Kingston
description: Janitorial services for buildings at CFB Kingston which are listed in the Contract. This all-inclusive requirement includes in addition to the cleaning tasks, project and program management tasks, deliverables and documents. The period of the Contract is from 1 February 2023 to 31 January 2026.
full_summary:
**Janitorial Services Contract Announcement**
===========================

**Tender Reference Number**: WS3731582812
**Amendment Number**: 2
**Publication Date**: November 1, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: December 5, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the provision of Janitorial Services at CFB Kingston, Ontario. This contract will provide comprehensive janitorial services for buildings located at the CFB Kingston site.

**Key Contract Details**
-----------------------

* **Contract Period**: 1 February 2023 to 31 January 2026
* **Option to Extend**: Canada has the right to extend the contract for up to 2 additional one-year periods.
* **Selection Criteria**: The contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price.

**Eligible Bidders**
-------------------

All qualified contractors are invited to submit a proposal. Note that bids must be submitted in accordance with the conditions outlined in the tender document.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Should you have any questions or require additional information regarding this contract, please contact Herb Choquette, PSPC at: <herb.choquette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

**Notice URL**
---------------

For more information, please visit the contract notice at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14518755?extsite=MTQ1MTg3NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that the requirement for this contract is National Level qualified.
